title: Trailer - Echoes Through Time - Immersive Conversations With History’s Greatest Minds
description: 60-second cinematic teaser. Meet Leo, a wide-eyed time-traveler who drops weekly 40-minute interviews with history’s greatest minds; immersive sound, rigorously fact-checked stories, sharp humor, and insights you’ll quote at dinner. Follow Echoes Through Time and start jumping centuries.

intro.speaker: Narrator
intro.text: Gather close, dear traveler! This is Echoes Through Time. Where every week young Leo leaps through centuries to share a fireside chat with the giants who shaped our world.

conversation.speaker: Leo
conversation.text: Whoa! Time travel really never gets old! <break time="0.4s"/>Napoleon? Is that really you?

conversation.speaker: Napoleon Bonaparte
conversation.text: I never won by chance, mon ami. Every risk was carefully calculated.

conversation.speaker: SFX
conversation.text: time ripple effect with soft crystalline tones, gracefully dissipating

conversation.speaker: Leo
conversation.text: And now I'm with Marcus Aurelius, the great Roman Emperor and philosopher!

conversation.speaker: Marcus Aurelius
conversation.text: Obice via est. The obstacle is the way, young traveler.

conversation.speaker: SFX
conversation.text: time ripple effect with soft crystalline tones, gracefully dissipating

conversation.speaker: Leo
conversation.text: Queen Cleopatra! Your wisdom on leadership is legendary.

conversation.speaker: Cleopatra
conversation.text: Power, my dear, <break time="0.4s"/>is pure theatre.

conversation.speaker: SFX
conversation.text: time ripple effect with soft crystalline tones, gracefully dissipating

conversation.speaker: Leo
conversation.text: Charles Darwin! The father of evolutionary theory himself!

conversation.speaker: Charles Darwin
conversation.text: Adapt or vanish. <break time="0.4s"/>Nature is not sentimental.

conversation.speaker: Leo
conversation.text: Conversations with Napoleon's strategic mind, Cleopatra's political theater, and Darwin's natural wisdom are already waiting! New journeys through time every Tuesday, just bring your curiosity!

outro.speaker: Narrator
outro.text: History's giants one conversation at a time. Discover the fascinating lives behind the legends.

outro.speaker: Leo
outro.text: Follow now and journey with me through time as history's most fascinating figures share their stories in your feed each week!

outro.speaker: SFX
outro.text: clock slowly ticking gradually diminishing into silence
